dt: {bc}to induce someone to convert to one's faith
{bc}to {d_link|recruit|recruit:1} someone to join one's party, institution, or cause
{bc}to recruit or convert especially to a new faith, institution, or cause

quotes.t: They are a sport-shirted, discomforted lot, pacing, puffing feverishly on cigarettes, perspiring freely and {qword}proselytizing{/qword} furiously.
His prodigious correspondence with twenty-five hundred scientists, politicians, and men of letters … {qword}proselytized{/qword} for his new science of statistics.

shortdef: to induce someone to convert to one's faith
to recruit someone to join one's party, institution, or cause
to recruit or convert especially to a new faith, institution, or cause
